extendedInfo.description: Tired of running through temples or slicing fruits? Download Ninja Sprint now for an absolutely wicked and insane ninja experience!Neko the Stray Cat was struck by lightning and attained human form with supernatural ninja powers. Neko is now faced with the troubles of unemployment because of her peculiar appearance, so this feline must provide for herself the only way a stray cat knows how: by slaughtering ancient monsters and stealing their coins.Sprint, slide, and jump through 80 addictive levels in four beautiful scenarios. Chop, slice, and slaughter hordes of enemies, avoid dangerous traps, and execute the most devastating and hilarious special attacks of all time! An adrenaline-pumping soundtrack and lots of crazy unlockables will keep you hooked!Full game features:* Sprint through 80 addictive levels in four scenarios.* Show no mercy and kill off everything that comes near you.* Execute devastating and completely insane special attacks.* Collect coins and unlock lots of crazy new features.* Choose among a variety of blood effects, from gore to flower power.* Share your high score online through NinjaSprint.com and through other social channels.* Listen to an adrenaline-pumping soundtrack composed by Rafael Dyll.* Get free access to future updates, including brand-new levels.Make sure to check out our other games and don't forget to rate Ninja Sprint. Your feedback and ratings keep us motivated to bring you even more game updates in the future.Reviews:Gaming Illustrated (81%)"Ninja Sprint is a solid, well-designed package"http://gamingillustrated.com/ninja-sprint-ios-review/Joystick Culture (8/10)"I certainly recommend Ninja Sprint"http://joystickculture.com/2012/12/23/review-ninja-sprint-iosandroid/RotoRob Gaming"Ninja Sprintâs amount of levels gives a real bang for your buck"http://videogamerrob.wordpress.com/2013/01/07/ios-review-ninja-sprint/LazyAssGamer"Ninja Sprint scores good marks for audio"http://lazyassgamer.com/ninja-sprint-review-606/Z-Giochi (Italian)http://www.z-giochi.com/recensioni/recensione-ninja-sprint-71256Connect with us:Facebook:http://www.facebook.com/eastasiasofthttp://www.facebook.com/NinjaSprintTwitter:http://www.twitter.com/eastasiasoftWeb:http://www.eastasiasoft.com
